## LogFactory.(constructor)

默认日志级别

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected constructor(level?: LogLevelEnum, sign?: string);
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                      | Description                        |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- |
| level     | [LogLevelEnum](./zhi-log.loglevelenum.md) | _(Optional)_ 可选，未设置默认 INFO |
| sign      | string                                    | _(Optional)_ 可选前缀，默认 zhi    |
